summary: This is an email from August 11, 2019, providing the Lieutenant's rounds report for August 9-10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including which computers were used to complete the rounds. It appears to be internal jail administrative documentation.

persons.name: Lt. Rounds
persons.context: The subject of the email references 'Lt. Rounds' for specific dates, indicating this individual is responsible for or associated with the security rounds reports.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The email is addressed to 'Warden', indicating it is a report sent to the facility's warden.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 11, 2019, reporting on Lieutenant's rounds for August 9-10, 2019.
It lists specific computer terminals (279, 283, 236) used to log the security rounds at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files related to Epstein.
This administrative record pertains to jail operations shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
